profile.name: ISMS Manager
profile.description: Full access to ISMS Assets, Risks, Controls, links and lifecycle actions across all organizations.

profile.name: ISMS Asset Maintainer
profile.description: Create and maintain ISMS Assets (typically within own organization). No publish or obsolete transitions.

profile.name: ISMS Risk Analyst
profile.description: Create and assess ISMS Risks, manage links to Assets/Controls and treatment data. No publish or obsolete transitions.

profile.name: ISMS Control Maintainer
profile.description: Create and maintain ISMS Controls and implementation details. Governance actions (approve/effective/retire) by Manager.

profile.name: ISMS Viewer
profile.description: Read-only access to ISMS Assets, Risks and Controls.
